extendedInfo.description: Ads can be removed by purchasing the app called Degree Planner Ad Free Key. This is only a key to remove ads in this app. Both apps must be kept installed for it to work.This is more than a simple GPA Calculator. Use this to achieve your college goals.This is one of the most feature rich GPA Calculator apps on the Play Store. You add semesters and then it shows you your GPA for that semester, your cumulative GPA, and how many credits and grade points you currently have. You can mark a courses grade as in progress so it doesn't affect your GPA scores.It stores all your data, so no need to ever reenter your grades. All saved courses can be easily changed or deleted.The Assignments feature allows you to track the individual grades you get in a course. With this information it will tell you the lowest grade you can make overall, the current by using the average of your grades, and the highest grade you can make.With the Degree Plan feature you can track what courses you still need to take before getting your degree. Enter the courses needed to get a certain degree, and as you add courses in a semester the app will automatically mark the course in your Degree Plan as taken. From there you're able to see what courses you still need to take. When adding a semester the course name will be auto-suggested from your courses that have yet to be taken.Have a hard time remembering your class schedule? With the Schedule feature you can easily enter the locations, times, and days that each of your classes meet for the semester. No more digging through your binder to find your schedule.With the GPA Calculator available you can easily see how new courses will affect your overall GPA without affecting your saved data. Have a 2.8 GPA and want to raise it to a 3.5? Use this calculator to see how many A's you need to obtain for that to happen.Please take the time to contact me if there is something you do not like about this app, and I will try to resolve the issue.Permissions:Internet is for loading ads.SD card is for backup/restore

reviews.title: If you\'re in college, you need this app
reviews.comment: Seriously. It\'s sleek and organized and contains a handful of features  that I have always wished were condensed into one application (memos for hw agenda, calculator for gpa,  etc).
reviews.author: Daniel Miller

reviews.title: Perfectly Simple
reviews.comment: I tried out many different apps like this and this one is by far my favorite. It is very simple, which in my opinion is why it works so well. It has everything I was looking for and more. BEST COLLEGE APP EVER!
reviews.author: Sonja Lay

reviews.title: Needs A Grade Replacement Function
reviews.comment: For example, have the app recognize retaken classes and prevent the previous  class from impacting the GPA. Most colleges have a retake and replace policy. Thanks so much!
reviews.author: Stone Parker

reviews.title: Could have gotten 5 stars, but.....
reviews.comment: When you load it, there is an ad for more apps and it has scrolling advertisements within the app. Please make an AD FREE app. I love how organized and user friendly this app is; just don\'t like the extras.
reviews.author: Arealia R

reviews.title: Finally!!
reviews.comment: I am heading back to school after a sabbatical and I had difficulty finding an app before.  You read my mind...I have been wanting to find an app like this or learn java and develop one myself.. WAY TO GO :)
reviews.author: Krystal Holland

reviews.title: Impressive
reviews.comment: User friendly meaning easy to use. Very clean set up, no distracting parts. Overall components and capabilities earns this a 5 from me. I\'m very impressed.
reviews.author: noskillreq

reviews.title: Good App
reviews.comment: I like this apo bc it helps me know how far along I am in my degree. The only thing I would change is the option to add more degrees instead of just the one.
reviews.author: Ashley Long

reviews.title: Perfect GPA App
reviews.comment: I only have one issue with this app, but that\'s not stopping me from rating it 5 stars.. I just happen to be an over achiever some times and would like to be able to keep track of 2 degree plans instead of 1..
reviews.author: Crystal Fish

reviews.title: Great App, Doesn\'t Work on 4.0 or Above
reviews.comment: The menu button is required to edit your remaining courses, so this app can\'t be used on 4.0 or above. Had no problems using it on my old phone, just can\'t use it on my Nexus 7.  Edit: fixed,  thank you!
reviews.author: Matt Stephen

reviews.title: Just what I needed!!
reviews.comment: Droid incredible 2 - Very simple and easy to understand. Has great instructions! I\'ve used a few other gpa calculators, and this one is by far the best!!
reviews.author: Kasey Spangle

reviews.title: Yup
reviews.comment: It\'s a decent app. Not bad at all. I like that you can calculate your gpa. I just wish the menu was on the welcome screen though.
reviews.author: DeAnna Hellinger

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: This app is great! It does everything I need it to.
reviews.author: Chris Norris

reviews.title: Good app!
reviews.comment: Been looking for a easier way to keep track of grades, this definitely does the job!
reviews.author: Laurissa Carpenter

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: This app is very easier to use and make college life an little easier:) this app is awesome!
reviews.author: Jazzmine Ramirez

reviews.title: Better than a lot
reviews.comment: Better than most of the other GPA calculators out there, very good app.
reviews.author: Miyaka Hana

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Its probably a great app but doesn\'t work above 4.0
reviews.author: Rachel Bazelais
